title: New Movies ANDROID APP v1.3 (with TV Shows added)
description:
ALL THE LATEST MOVIES AND TV SHOWS AVAILABLE ON TORRENTS!!!!!!!



New Movies is the best android app for all Movie & TV Show lovers.

*** If you want to watch Movies or TV Shows and don't know how, please contact us on

Best features: Movies:

- NEW MOVIES tab: Latest movies available on Web. Updated daily. Blockbusters have blue star in top right corner for you to know which movies are the best. Also when you click on the movie you are redirected to IMDb where you can see the trailer and all the things you need to know about a movie.

- UPCOMING tab: Gives you all the movies which are going to be released in theaters soon.

- POPULAR tab - Shows the list of the most popular movies at this time. List is shown by Movie Database.

- TOP RATED tab: Shows the list of top rated movies of all time. List is shown by Movie Database.

- All movies in upcoming, popular and top rated tab can be added to favorites and tracked later.

- Watch trailers, summary and cast of a movie.

Best features: TV Shows:

- NEW SHOWS tab: Latest TV Shows available on Web. Updated daily.  Also when you click on the TV Show  you are redirected to IMDb where you can see the trailer and all the things you need to know about a show.

- ON THE AIR tab: Gives you all the TV Shows which are currently showing on televison.

- POPULAR tab - Shows the list of the most popular TV Shows at this time. List is shown by Movie Database.

- TOP RATED tab: Shows the list of top rated TV Shows of all time. List is shown by Movie Database.

*** If you want to request a TV show to be shown in â€žNew showsâ€œ tab please contact us at
